NewsLetter.description: A 10 minute-walk from Agadir Beach, this hotel features an outdoor pool surrounded by a garden and a snack bar. Decorated with typical Moroccan elements, it offers 24-hour reception, terrace and free Wi-Fi.
NewsLetter.title: ALL GUEST ROOMS HAVE A VIEW AND RELAXATION FACILITIES
NewsLetter.decOne: All the air-conditioned rooms include a balcony with a view of the surrounding area. Each room has a satellite TV and an en suite bathroom with free toiletries.
NewsLetter.decTwo: A continental breakfast can be ordered in the morning. You can choose to dine in the traditional Moroccan or the international restaurant, read in the reading room or relax in the Moroccan lounge.
NewsLetter.decTree: Hotel Aferni is a 30-minute drive from the international airport of Agadir-Al Massira. It is a 35-minute stroll to the Agadir Marina and La Casbah Museum (Musee de Talborjt) is a 10-minute drive away.
